title: Upon certification by the Director of Industries / Director of Industrial Safety and Health / Competent Authority that the Chemical Industry has been permanently closed or has shifted elsewhere, the 100 m
clause_text: Upon certification by the Director of Industries / Director of Industrial Safety and Health / Competent Authority that the Chemical Industry has been permanently closed or has shifted elsewhere, the 100 m. Green Belt and the further 150 m. low density belt around the plot boundary of such Chemical Industry shall suo-moto cease to exist.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
